title: Megan Hoover
text:
Megan Hoover
Hi, I’m Megan; a Michigan native. I’m currently in the Ecosystem Science & Sustainability program at Colorado State University, and I’m working on a Watershed Science minor as well. I’ve got skills in data analysis, hydrology, and project management. I love learning new skills related to my field and teaching them to the community. In my free time I like to go on adventures, craft, cook, or spend time with my husband and two dogs. Check out my site!

title: Projects
text: I wrote some code, and did some cool data science. Here is a collection of links!

title: Projects
text:
Building a project website

In this assignment we built a static users site with Github Pages
Includes a github repo for access to all the code.
Look at how high quality my work is!

title: Projects
text:
Karenia Brevis Toxic Algae

In this assignment we investigated correlations of Karenia Brevis along the Western Florida Coast and attempted to create models for predicting blooms. We built a static users site with Github Pages
Repo: GitHub Link

title: Projects
section: Stream Quality Status in Ottawa County, MI
text:
Stream Quality Status in Ottawa County, MI

In this assignment I wanted to show stream status in Ottawa County, Michigan. I ussed stream status data, streams/river vector data, and counties vector data as bounding box. The large data sets (NLCD_2024_CU.tif and Assessment_Units_2024_-_Rivers_and_Streams.geojson)
